title: Understanding and Treating Imbalances Using Energy Therapy
first_phrase: In the preceding text, we learned that a disequilibrium of energetically hypo and hyper-biological states could cause illness. The most straightforward therapy requires rebalancing these states. The magnétiseur's goal is calming, but the distinction must be made between calming the choleric and equalizing the sanguine to reintegrate hypo-energetic states. We now see how this concept of hypo and hyper states is echoed across various medical analyses as far back as 500 BC (referenced below). In this final section, we dive deeper into the types of Humid and Dry concerning Vagotonia and Sympathictony.

last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the concepts of Hyper and Hypo states can help in analyzing various fields such as medicine, psychology, and personality types.
